LanguageData.MURWallLight_EnableWallLightDesc: If this is checked the Wall Light and its color variants will be available for construction.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_LightRadDesc: How far the light radiates from the source. Default: 8
LanguageData.MURWallLight_SteelCostDesc: How much steel a single light costs to build. Default: 5
LanguageData.MURWallLight_PowerCostDesc: How much power a single light consumes. Default: 10
LanguageData.MURWallLight_ShowRadiusDesc: When placing a Wall Light this will show the approximate area that will be lit by the light, and the area of the room that is currently considered lit (above 30% light).
LanguageData.MURWallLight_ShowFacingDesc: Show the direction the light is facing on the Wall Light's name (N, S, W, E).
LanguageData.MURWallLight_ExtraColorsDesc: Enables extended colors by SineSwiper, adds light colors: Yellow, Magenta, Cyan, Rose, Violet, Azure, Spring Green, Chartreuse, and Orange.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_WarningNeedWall: Must be placed over a wall.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_WarningBlocked: Must be facing a passable tile.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_WarningBoth: Must be placed over a wall, facing a passable tile.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_AlertReload: Please save and load the game for the changes to take effect.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_AlertUpdate: Updated from old version of Wall Light. Please give the lights a moment to turn back on.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_AlertRestart: Please restart Rimworld for the changes to take effect.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_EnableSunDesc: If this is checked the Wall Sun Light will be available for construction.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_SunLightRadDesc: The range that will be considered brightly lit and allow plants to grow. Default: 5
LanguageData.MURWallLight_SunSteelCostDesc: How much steel a single sun light costs to build. Default: 10
LanguageData.MURWallLight_SunPowerCostDesc: How much power a single sun light consumes while active. Default: 600
LanguageData.MURWallLight_DisableRestDesc: If enabled the sun light will not turn off for the default plant resting period.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_WhiteModeDesc: Replaces the cool purple color of the sun light with a bland white color.
